properties.Notes: In addition to releasing two-and-a-quarter MILLION pounds of toxic substances in 2014 (check the EPA report), BP Whiting has recently been in the news for gas price hikes occasioned by the unplanned shutdown of its crude distillation units in summer 2015, and more importantly, for its oil spill into Lake Michigan. The Whiting refinery is among the world's largest processers of Alberta tar sands oil, which is brought to the Chicagoland area by Enbridge company pipelines.
